thread.title: U.S. consumer protection official puts Equifax probe on ice

title: U.S. consumer protection official puts Equifax probe on ice
text:
U.S. consumer protection official puts Equifax probe on ice 1:08am IST - 01:33 
Head of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau, Mick Mulvaney, has pulled back from a full-scale probe of how Equifax failed to protect the personal data of millions of consumers, according to people familiar with the matter. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Head of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau, Mick Mulvaney, has pulled back from a full-scale probe of how Equifax failed to protect the personal data of millions of consumers, according to people familiar with the matter.
